oracleReaderQuery.value:
SELECT  PYEAR
,PLSCN
,PMNTH
,MATNR
,EKORG
,WERKS
,KONWA
,KMEIN
,KPEIN
,PEINH
,YSUNK
,DMBTR
,SUYUL
,YULUN
,LABOR
,MTART
,MATKL
,SPART
,ERDAT
,ERNAM
,AEDAT
,AENAM
,BUKRS
  FROM @{pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema}.@{pipeline().parameters.SourceTable}
where PYEAR >= '@{variables('year')}'

SELECT  BUDAT
,MBLNR
,MJAHR
,ZEILE
,WERKS
,MATNR
,MAKTX
,BWART
,BTEXT
,ERFME
,ERFMG
,PRICE
,DMBTR
,LGORT
,LGOBE
,MATN1
,MAKT1
,SHKZG
,DISPO
,DSNAM
,WAERS
,ZDATA
,ZTIME
,ZNAME
,BUKRS   
  FROM @{pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema}.@{pipeline().parameters.SourceTable}
where BUDAT between '@{variables('prev_start')}' and '@{variables('prev_end')}'
@concat('SELECT DISTINCT(SUBSTR(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ', 1, 6)) CALMONTH FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable)
@concat('SELECT * FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' WHERE SUBSTR(',pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ', 1, 6) = ', item().CALMONTH)

SELECT *
  FROM CD_POSMGR.LO_OWHBD
 WHERE OWHREQSYMD >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND OWHREQSYMD <= TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM')),'YYYYMMDD');

SELECT *
  FROM CD_POSMGR.LO_OWHBD
 WHERE OWHREQSYMD >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND OWHREQSYMD <= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE-1),'YYYYMMDD');
@concat('SELECT DISTINCT(SUBSTR(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ', 1, 6)) CALMONTH FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable)
@concat('SELECT * FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' WHERE SUBSTR(',pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ', 1, 6) = ', item().CALMONTH)

SELECT *
  FROM CD_POSMGR.LO_OWHHD
 WHERE OWHREQSYMD >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND OWHREQSYMD <= TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM')),'YYYYMMDD');

SELECT *
  FROM CD_POSMGR.LO_OWHHD
 WHERE OWHREQSYMD >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND OWHREQSYMD <= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE-1),'YYYYMMDD');
@concat('SELECT DISTINCT(SUBSTR(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ', 1, 6)) CALMONTH FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable)
@concat('SELECT * FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' WHERE SUBSTR(',pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ', 1, 6) = ', item().CALMONTH)

SELECT *
  FROM CD_POSMGR.SA_DPSITINFO
 WHERE DPSITYMD >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND DPSITYMD <= TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM')),'YYYYMMDD');

SELECT *
  FROM CD_POSMGR.SA_DPSITINFO
 WHERE DPSITYMD >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND DPSITYMD <= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE-1),'YYYYMMDD');
@concat('SELECT DISTINCT(SUBSTR(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ', 1, 6)) CALMONTH FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable)
@concat('SELECT * FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' WHERE SUBSTR(',pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ', 1, 6) = ', item().CALMONTH)

SELECT *
  FROM CD_POSMGR.SA_MILEAGETRAN
 WHERE USEYMD >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND USEYMD <= TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM')),'YYYYMMDD');

SELECT *
  FROM CD_POSMGR.SA_MILEAGETRAN
 WHERE USEYMD >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND USEYMD <= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE-1),'YYYYMMDD');
@concat('SELECT DISTINCT(SUBSTR(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ', 1, 6)) CALMONTH FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable)
@concat('SELECT * FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' WHERE SUBSTR(',pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ', 1, 6) = ', item().CALMONTH)

SELECT *
  FROM CD_POSMGR.SA_ORDDTL
 WHERE ORDYMD >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND ORDYMD <= TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM')),'YYYYMMDD');

SELECT *
  FROM CD_POSMGR.SA_ORDDTL
 WHERE ORDYMD >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND ORDYMD <= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE-1),'YYYYMMDD');
@concat('SELECT DISTINCT(SUBSTR(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ', 1, 6)) CALMONTH FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable)
@concat('SELECT * FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' WHERE SUBSTR(',pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ', 1, 6) = ', item().CALMONTH)

SELECT *
  FROM CD_POSMGR.SA_ORDMST
 WHERE ORDYMD >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND ORDYMD <= TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM')),'YYYYMMDD');

SELECT *
  FROM CD_POSMGR.SA_ORDMST
 WHERE ORDYMD >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND ORDYMD <= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE-1),'YYYYMMDD');

properties.description:
- 초기 적재시, 월별로 모든 파일 Sink
- 증분컬럼이 YYYYMMDDhhmmss 형태

oracleReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT DISTINCT(SUBSTR(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ', 1, 6)) CALMONTH FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable)
@concat('SELECT * FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' WHERE SUBSTR(',pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ', 1, 6) = ', item().CALMONTH)

properties.description:
- 증분 적재시, 전달+현재 달 파일 Delete후 새로 생성
- 증분컬럼이 YYYYMMDDhhmmss 형태
- Copy data Current Month > Source > Query 변경 필요
- Copy data Previous Month > Source > Query 변경 필요

oracleReaderQuery.value:
SELECT *
  FROM CD_VOC.T_VOC
 WHERE created_date >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM'),'YYYYMMDDhhmmss')
   AND created_date <= TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM')),'YYYYMMDDhhmmss');

SELECT *
  FROM CD_VOC.T_VOC
 WHERE created_date >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),'YYYYMMDDhhmmss')
   AND created_date <= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE-1),'YYYYMMDDhhmmss');

properties.description:
- 초기 적재시, 월별로 모든 파일 Sink
- 증분컬럼이 DATE 형식

oracleReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT DISTINCT(TO_CHAR(TRUNC(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ',''MM''), ''YYYY-MM-DD'')) STARTDT FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' ORDER BY STARTDT')

@concat('SELECT * FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' WHERE ', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ' >= ','''', item().STARTDT, '''', ' AND ', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ' <= ', 'LAST_DAY(','''', item().STARTDT,'''', ')')

properties.description:
- 증분 적재시, 전달+현재 달 파일 Delete후 새로 생성
- 증분컬럼이 DATE 형태
- Copy data Current Month > Source > Query 변경 필요
- Copy data Previous Month > Source > Query 변경 필요

oracleReaderQuery.value:
SELECT *
  FROM CD_WEITEM.TB_PRDT_INFO_MULTI_DATA
 WHERE REG_DT >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM'),'YYYY-MM-DD')
   AND REG_DT <= TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM')),'YYYY-MM-DD');

SELECT *
  FROM CD_WEITEM.TB_PRDT_INFO_MULTI_DATA 
 WHERE REG_DT >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),'YYYY-MM-DD')
   AND REG_DT <= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE-1),'YYYY-MM-DD');

oracleReaderQuery.value:
SELECT *
  FROM CD_WMS.IFWMSONLINE_BO
 WHERE SHIPPING_DATE >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND SHIPPING_DATE <= TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM')),'YYYYMMDD');

SELECT *
  FROM CD_WMS.IFWMSONLINE_BO
 WHERE SHIPPING_DATE >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND SHIPPING_DATE <= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE-1),'YYYYMMDD');
